comments.body: When you buy crypto in an app wallet it automatically be shown in your wallet balance and if youw want to sell it then it's almost the same as buying but instead of paying fiat you will be paying the crypto you have and receive what you want to receive. At this time, most of the exchange required you to do KYC before your withdrawal amount is increase as what baofeng mentioned. If you don't want to do KYC then you are most likely stuck with the withdrawal amount that you currently have unless you find another legit exchange that doesn't require KYC for that kind of amount.
